name: Picrastination
description: Picrastination is a logic-based puzzle game where the aim is to solve numerical clues to reveal pictures. Each puzzle also contains a cultural reference, a joke, or a pun for added enjoyment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
